short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the word police with 'men with guns'

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will replace the word "police" with the phrase "men with guns" in the text of web pages displayed in the browser.  That substitution may change the way readers relate to discussions of police officers and their actions.
